featured.text: Finally, football fans seem to love the half-time activities, the marching bands, and the pretty cheerleaders.
28 , professional football teams usually play no more than fourteen games a year.
The man who has played football knows that teamwork is 39 in modern living.
To begin with, football is a quicker, more physical sport, and football fans enjoy the emotional involvement they feel while watching.

other.text: People hoist their glasses 30 they are sitting around ski lodges, sailing, dancing, or enjoying a football game.
Wherever football is played, the players learn the rough-and-tumble lesson that only through the 34 of each member can the team win.

definition.zh_def: 一種團隊運動，通常由兩隊在長方形場地上進行，目的是將球踢進對方的球門得分。
definition.en_def: A team sport played on a rectangular field, where two teams aim to score by getting a ball into the opposing team's goal.
definition.example: The football match ended in a thrilling draw.
